title: wmiran
author: wmiran
created_time: November 16, 2023, 03:29:48 AMLast edit: March 27, 2025, 02:05:36 PM by wmiran
content: "Hello to all forum readers!We are introducing our semi-automated cryptocurrency exchange service at wmiran.com. Here, you can trade various cryptocurrencies, including Bitcoin (BTC) and Tether (TRC). We also plan to expand our range by adding more cryptocurrency options in the near future.Our services are available 24/7, seven days a week. All transactions are processed manually with a maximum processing time of 60 minutes.By choosing us, you get:1. Competitive Rates: We offer the best prices for buying and selling, matching leading global cryptocurrency exchanges.2. Extensive Reserves: We ensure a wide range of cryptocurrencies and fiat currencies are available in significant quantities.3. Diverse Exchange Options: We provide a wide selection of payment systems for fund withdrawals.4. Secure Transactions: Our service guarantees multi-level security for your funds during transactions.5. AML-Free Transactions6. Asset Purity Guarantee: We guarantee that the asset you receive from us during the exchange is absolutely clean and has a low AML risk level.Visit wmiran.com for secure cryptocurrency exchanges, including Bitcoin (BTC) and other popular digital currencies.For inquiries, please contact us at wmiran@yandex.com

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: You made an announcement in the wrong board. It should probably be moved to Service AnnouncementsSecondly, you sayQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 03:29:48 AMOur services are available 24/7, seven days a week. All transactions are processed manually with a maximum processing time of 90 minutes.But on the site I see thisQuote09:00 ~ 22:00Which virtually means that's your operating time and not the 24/7 that you claim

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on November 16, 2023, 12:24:38 PMYou made an announcement in the wrong board. It should probably be moved to Service AnnouncementsSecondly, you sayQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 03:29:48 AMOur services are available 24/7, seven days a week. All transactions are processed manually with a maximum processing time of 90 minutes.But on the site I see thisQuote09:00 ~ 22:00Which virtually means that's your operating time and not the 24/7 that you claimThe mistake  you mentioned has been rectified, and the topic is now prepared for relocation to the Service Announcements section.I will create a new topic in the Service Announcements section.Thank you.

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: The site is very unresponsive, the first try was partially successful and I was able to check your partner list. Second try and so on "site could not be reached".But, are you serious about partnering with bitcointalk.org? Can you persuade an administrator to confirm your claim?Quote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 12:53:08 PMI will create a new topic in the Service Announcements section.No need, you just need to move the topic. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265053.0

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 12:53:08 PMThe mistake  you mentioned has been rectified, and the topic is now prepared for relocation to the Service Announcements section.Also try to correct the translation on your homepage. When changing for Russian to English. I noticed there were still some untranslated Russian words like thisThe terms of service are also not detailed enough. I know you don't require KYC but for a person to use your site, the still need to register using some details. You need to talk about your privacy policy, among other things.

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on November 16, 2023, 01:42:43 PMThe site is very unresponsive, the first try was partially successful and I was able to check your partner list. Second try and so on "site could not be reached".But, are you serious about partnering with bitcointalk.org? Can you persuade an administrator to confirm your claim?Quote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 12:53:08 PMI will create a new topic in the Service Announcements section.No need, you just need to move the topic. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5265053.0You're absolutely right; all the links from the partner list have indeed been removed. Our intention was to guide our users to forum topics or monitoring services, but we inadvertently left the partner list empty. We appreciate your diligence in pointing this out.As for the website, we acknowledge the responsive issue, and we have plans to address all these concerns in the near future to enhance the overall user experience.At the moment, the website is in maintenance mode.Best of luck!

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: logfiles on November 16, 2023, 02:10:44 PMQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 12:53:08 PMThe mistake  you mentioned has been rectified, and the topic is now prepared for relocation to the Service Announcements section.Also try to correct the translation on your homepage. When changing for Russian to English. I noticed there were still some untranslated Russian words like thishttps://talkimg.com/images/2023/11/16/FQI6Z.pnghttps://talkimg.com/images/2023/11/16/FQsV8.pngThe terms of service are also not detailed enough. I know you don't require KYC but for a person to use your site, the still need to register using some details. You need to talk about your privacy policy, among other things.-The translation issue has been resolved. Thank you for your attention.-No registration is required to create an order. Users can place orders without the need to create an account or provide any personal information. The process involves just two simple steps: specifying the amount, providing the destination wallet, and making the payment. That's all that's required.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: The first impression when I see your exchange, you're somewhat ask people who have coins that associated with illegal activity to use your exchange lol.You need to add onion address to make sure we believe you didn't store any data.Quote from: https://wmiran.com/en/tos/We accept assets with AML (Anti-Money Laundering) risk ranging from 0% to 100%. In exchange, we commit to delivering assets to our users that have minimal AML risk and clear origin of funds.What does this mean? seems like contradicts each other. If you accept assets that has a risk from 0%-100%, isn't you don't have to care about the origin of funds?

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on November 16, 2023, 02:52:58 PMThe first impression when I see your exchange, you're somewhat ask people who have coins that associated with illegal activity to use your exchange lol.You need to add onion address to make sure we believe you didn't store any data.Quote from: https://wmiran.com/en/tos/We accept assets with AML (Anti-Money Laundering) risk ranging from 0% to 100%. In exchange, we commit to delivering assets to our users that have minimal AML risk and clear origin of funds.What does this mean? seems like contradicts each other. If you accept assets that has a risk from 0%-100%, isn't you don't have to care about the origin of funds?An onion address will also be added in the near future, so there's no need to worry.Regarding the AML risk ranging from 0% to 100%, it means that we do not differentiate between the AML risk levels associated with user assets in the AML monitoring system. We accept and provide users with USDT from clean sources.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: I kept getting the following error whenever I try to change the language to english, strange.QuoteCиcтeмнaя oшибкa (кoд: anticsfr)I tried with a different browser, IPs, device and had the same error.On that note, I think it's a good idea to set the language to english by default since you're planning to cater globally.

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: Potato Chips on November 16, 2023, 05:00:49 PMI kept getting the following error whenever I try to change the language to english, strange.QuoteCиcтeмнaя oшибкa (кoд: anticsfr)I tried with a different browser, IPs, device and had the same error.On that note, I think it's a good idea to set the language to english by default since you're planning to cater globally.The error mentioned has been resolved. Thank you for your attention.Currently, our website defaults to English, with Russian as the second language. We plan to add more languages in the near future.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: You seem to be in a hurry launching your platform you ended up doing it prematurely. It seems your website is far from complete. I guess you better do some polishing first before getting back promoting it. You're claiming to have 24/7 support and yet your operator is offline. And despite choosing English, there are still words that are in Russian. Your chatbox is also in Russian language by default? There doesn't seem to have an option to translate it to English. The UI is generally unattractive. I'm sure you can improve it a lot.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: Quote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 02:25:05 PM[quote author=logfilNo registration is required to create an order. Users can place orders without the need to create an account or provide any personal information. The process involves just two simple steps: specifying the amount, providing the destination wallet, and making the payment. That's all that's required.How would you manage a dispute then? If a scammer provides a fake order, or if a buyer claims that they've sent the money while using a chargeback, wouldn't this mean the transaction is likely going to fail? Or does this mean you ask people to send the money first before processing any transaction? What's the guarantee that you send the money then?

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on November 17, 2023, 01:57:04 AMYou seem to be in a hurry launching your platform you ended up doing it prematurely. It seems your website is far from complete. I guess you better do some polishing first before getting back promoting it. The first impression and user experience of the platform for the first time is what determines how future growth will be, wmiran do not rush to launch the platform if everything is not ready, especially translation, support team, liquidity and exchange rate.The AML-Free Transactions policy is good, but advertising it may cause you legal problems. Do not talk about this as a feature, but say that you do not require identity verification for deposits higher than 100 Bitcoin.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 06:00:03 PMThe error mentioned has been resolved. Thank you for your attention.Currently, our website defaults to English, with Russian as the second language.I thought the same last night as I checked it before going to sleep however, I'm afraid the error has shown up again, same with RU being the default language. I added a gif.

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on November 16, 2023, 02:52:58 PMThe first impression when I see your exchange, you're somewhat ask people who have coins that associated with illegal activity to use your exchange lol.You need to add onion address to make sure we believe you didn't store any data.Quote from: https://wmiran.com/en/tos/We accept assets with AML (Anti-Money Laundering) risk ranging from 0% to 100%. In exchange, we commit to delivering assets to our users that have minimal AML risk and clear origin of funds.What does this mean? seems like contradicts each other. If you accept assets that has a risk from 0%-100%, isn't you don't have to care about the origin of funds?Certainly, while the source of origin of assets is crucial for many exchanges, in our case, it is not a significant factor. We are here to provide a free AML service, allowing you to convert these assets into USDT without the need to worry about their origin.

comments.author: wmiran
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on November 17, 2023, 01:57:04 AMYou seem to be in a hurry launching your platform you ended up doing it prematurely. It seems your website is far from complete. I guess you better do some polishing first before getting back promoting it. You're claiming to have 24/7 support and yet your operator is offline. And despite choosing English, there are still words that are in Russian. Your chatbox is also in Russian language by default? There doesn't seem to have an option to translate it to English. The UI is generally unattractive. I'm sure you can improve it a lot.The script we are using is based on the Russian language, so it's normal that some minor issues, as you mentioned, may catch your attention. However, we have already addressed and resolved these issues. Please clear your browser cache and try again to check the user interface. Good luck!Quote from: joniboini on November 17, 2023, 02:05:52 AMQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 02:25:05 PM[quote author=logfilNo registration is required to create an order. Users can place orders without the need to create an account or provide any personal information. The process involves just two simple steps: specifying the amount, providing the destination wallet, and making the payment. That's all that's required.How would you manage a dispute then? If a scammer provides a fake order, or if a buyer claims that they've sent the money while using a chargeback, wouldn't this mean the transaction is likely going to fail? Or does this mean you ask people to send the money first before processing any transaction? What's the guarantee that you send the money then?Here are a few simple steps for users to create an order:1. Fill in the required fields.2. Proceed through the steps until you get to the wallet for payment.Any new order created by a user will be available for 24 hours. During this 24-hour period, users have the time to transfer the asset to the wallet provided. If the user does not make the payment within this time frame, the order will be deleted from the system.On the other hand, if a user pays the order within the 24-hour window, we will process the order within 60 minutes and manually change the order status to "successfully paid." From this moment, the order link will be available for the user for 72 hours to check the TX ID, which we will provide after payment and more. We believe that the timing we have set for users is sufficient to address any issues or verify transactions effectively.Quote from: Husires on November 17, 2023, 08:13:00 AMQuote from: Darker45 on November 17, 2023, 01:57:04 AMYou seem to be in a hurry launching your platform you ended up doing it prematurely. It seems your website is far from complete. I guess you better do some polishing first before getting back promoting it. The first impression and user experience of the platform for the first time is what determines how future growth will be, wmiran do not rush to launch the platform if everything is not ready, especially translation, support team, liquidity and exchange rate.The AML-Free Transactions policy is good, but advertising it may cause you legal problems. Do not talk about this as a feature, but say that you do not require identity verification for deposits higher than 100 Bitcoin.  Quote from: Potato Chips on November 17, 2023, 09:49:28 PMQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 06:00:03 PMThe error mentioned has been resolved. Thank you for your attention.Currently, our website defaults to English, with Russian as the second language.I thought the same last night as I checked it before going to sleep however, I'm afraid the error has shown up again, same with RU being the default language. I added a gif.https://talkimg.com/images/2023/11/17/FtCbf.gifThank you for providing the GIF screenshot. To resolve the issue you're facing, please clear your browser cache and then try again. good luckhttps://i.ibb.co/MGcPc0g/Screenshot-2023-11-18-at-12-35-43.png

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: It is still not possible to change the language. System error (code: anticsfr)Quote from: wmiran on November 18, 2023, 09:24:30 AMThe script we are using is based on the Russian language, so it's normal that some minor issues, as you mentioned, may catch your attention. However, we have already addressed and resolved these issues. Please clear your browser cache and try again to check the user interface. Good luck!Well, you use WordPress script here, and as far as I know, it is in English by default. I am not sure what kind of minor errors you are talking about here, except that it is an error in the bad setup of the WP script.Is it possible that you were in such a hurry to present this here, and there are so many shortcomings? I guess you should do all possible tests first, before publication, so only after that do you ask the community to help you with testing. Based on everything I've seen, I seriously doubt the capacity of this service.

comments.author: tabas

The website itself is lacking of a lot of things based on the design that you've got.Quote from: Potato Chips on November 17, 2023, 09:49:28 PMQuote from: wmiran on November 16, 2023, 06:00:03 PMThe error mentioned has been resolved. If an incoming transaction is not detected within this timeframe, the order will be automatically removed.What if someone tries to use your website and then because of the fee, the transaction stuck for so long and never got confirmed within the timeframe. But then, after a few days it has got confirmed, will the transaction rejected and will be refunded to the sender?

But then, after a few days it has got confirmed, will the transaction rejected and will be refunded to the sender?And regarding your question, before a user creates an order, we have a field called 'Wallet for Refund,' where we explain that if a transaction is confirmed after 72 hours, the system will initiate a refund to the wallet provided by the user.https://i.ibb.co/PFv3xBf/Screenshot-2023-11-18-at-18-54-55.pngWe will try to fix all the issues and be back shortly.
